name: part_005
file: tmp_【#天音かなた3DLIVE】僕が主役でもいいですか？【ホロライブ】 [8lkam88qeZw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs the song 'Fixer' on a stylized stage with red and black visuals.
Instrumental transition between songs with a change in visual setting.
Amane Kanata performs the song 'Additional Memory' with stylized lyrics appearing on screen.

subtitles.original: 「大丈夫」と言わせて あとから君のせいにさせてはくれないか
subtitles.english: Let me say "it's okay", and later let me blame it on you

subtitles.original: 今更意味ないから あとから君のせいにさせてはくれないか
subtitles.english: It's meaningless now, so later let me blame it on you

subtitles.original: できやしない約束を 滔々と溢れる一言一言ばかり
subtitles.english: Endlessly overflowing word by word of promises that can't be kept

subtitles.original: もう奪われるくらい
subtitles.english: Being snatched away so much

subtitles.original: 意味をなさない 何もできない
subtitles.english: Making no sense, unable to do anything

subtitles.original: 見えない 逃げたい 飛びたい やめたい そらさないから
subtitles.english: I can't see, I want to run, I want to fly, I want to stop, I won't look away

subtitles.original: 沈め 沈め 這い上がれないほどまで
subtitles.english: Sink, sink, until you can't climb back up

subtitles.original: 飽きるまで 落とせ 落とせ
subtitles.english: Until you're bored, drop, drop

subtitles.original: 救い垂らす時まで
subtitles.english: Until the time of salvation drips

subtitles.original: 嘘つく粒をのどからしぼり出して日々ごと噛みくだく
subtitles.english: Squeezing out the seeds of lies from my throat and crushing them day by day

subtitles.original: 下手な花火でしたような口ぶりにそってやり過ごす
subtitles.english: Getting by following the way of speaking like poor fireworks

subtitles.original: なりたくはなかった 共役なはずの眠い眠い理想で
subtitles.english: I didn't want to become that, with a sleepy, sleepy ideal that should be conjugate

subtitles.original: 救われることを待つ
subtitles.english: Waiting to be saved

subtitles.original: 一番目は胃の口だよ
subtitles.english: The first is the entrance to the stomach

subtitles.original: ちから強くかたく痛く噛みしめて
subtitles.english: Biting down strongly, firmly, and painfully

subtitles.original: 死んでしまえ 死んでしまえ
subtitles.english: Die, die

subtitles.original: この先も過去も知らず
subtitles.english: Knowing neither the future nor the past

subtitles.original: 壊せ 壊せ
subtitles.english: Break, break

subtitles.original: どうせなら加害者になればいい
subtitles.english: If anything, you should just become the perpetrator

subtitles.original: 堪えきれない苛立ちも
subtitles.english: The unbearable irritation too

subtitles.original: 何も生まない悲しみも
subtitles.english: And the sadness that produces nothing

subtitles.original: 味気なくて吐き出す前に
subtitles.english: Before spitting out the tastelessness

subtitles.original: もう、もう次を歌え
subtitles.english: Already, already sing the next

subtitles.original: 沈め 沈め
subtitles.english: Sink, sink

subtitles.original: 壊せ 壊せ
subtitles.english: Break, break

subtitles.original: 踊れ 踊れ 灰色になりきる前に
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, before becoming completely gray

subtitles.original: 打ち鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Strike and sound

subtitles.original: 変われ 変われ 眠りに落ちる時まで
subtitles.english: Change, change, until the moment you fall asleep

subtitles.original: 奪え 奪え
subtitles.english: Snatch, snatch

subtitles.original: 飼いならした嘘あばいて
subtitles.english: Expose the tamed lies

subtitles.original: 見えてあげる 頭に起きた
subtitles.english: I'll show you, what happened in my head

subtitles.original: 虚像を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was looking at a virtual image

subtitles.original: 虚像を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was looking at a virtual image

subtitles.original: アディショナルメモリー / 作詞・作曲：じん
subtitles.english: Additional Memory / Lyrics & Composition: Jin

subtitles.original: 浮かんで 転げ落ちて 出会ったエンドロール
subtitles.english: Floating, tumbling down, meeting the end roll

subtitles.original: 歪んで 変わり果てた 未来の走馬灯
subtitles.english: Distorted, completely changed lantern of the future

subtitles.original: おしまいな 幕の切れてしまった白昼夢は
subtitles.english: It's over, the daydream whose curtain has been cut

subtitles.original: ただただ 虚しさ達を 暈してみせた
subtitles.english: Just blurring the emptinesses

subtitles.original: 思い出してしまう 夕焼ける空
subtitles.english: I end up remembering, the sunset sky

subtitles.original: 滲むメロディ
subtitles.english: The blurring melody

subtitles.original: 「帰ろう、道を間違わないように」
subtitles.english: "Let's go home, so as not to lose our way"
